nameEntry.part: University of Alberta. Office of the Associate Vice-President (Information Systems)

biogHist.p: The office was responsible for coordinating University information activities and systems, including the Library, Computing Services, Printing Services, the University Press, University Archives and University Collections. These activities became part of the responsibilities of the Vice-President (Student and Academic Services) in 1990. Associate Vice-Presidents: 1985-1990 John Tartar.
